healthBenefits.name: Aloe Vera
healthBenefits.description: Aloe Vera is known for its soothing and healing properties, especially for skin conditions.

healthBenefits.name: Lavender
healthBenefits.description: Lavender is often used for its calming effects and can help reduce stress and anxiety.

healthBenefits.name: Mint
healthBenefits.description: Mint is great for digestion and can help relieve indigestion and nausea.

healthBenefits.name: Rosemary
healthBenefits.description: Rosemary can improve concentration and memory, and has anti-inflammatory properties.

healthBenefits.name: Basil
healthBenefits.description: Basil has antibacterial properties and is rich in antioxidants.
